events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because it does not fit me at all and I am very disappointed.
The issue has been categorized under refund based on the customer's request and description of the problem.
The refund request case has been assigned to agent Emily for handling and follow-up.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t fit. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging for the refund process?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is still unused but I have already removed the tags. Will that affect the refund?
Thank you for the information. Normally, returns require original tags attached. However, I can escalate your case to our returns department to see if an exception can be made.
That sounds good, thank you for checking on that for me. I appreciate your help and hope the refund can still be processed.
Your case has been escalated to the returns department for approval given the missing tags but unused condition.
Good news! The returns team approved your refund despite the missing tags. Please send the jacket back and we will process your refund promptly.
We wanted to check in to confirm you've sent the jacket back and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I shipped it yesterday and received confirmation from the courier. Thanks again for your support throughout this process.
The refund has been processed successfully and your case is now closed. We appreciate your patience and hope to serve you better in the future.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to gather feedback on your experience with our refund process. Thank you for your time.
